attributes.action: Videos in any  care situation where there are vulnerables!
attributes.additional_details:
I want there to be changes in any kind of care system.  Be it from the private, 3rd sector or public sector.  where there are vulnerables from any age. For everyone's safety, it should be standard that video camera's are installed and monitored.
No abuse, be it mental, physical, verbal should ever be allowed.  These changes should have happened yesterday, please make it happen. Sign this petition and ask others!!!! thanks.

rejection.details: Please see: WE NEED CCTV IN CARE HOMES AND NURSING HOMES TO PROTECT THE SERVICE USER AND WORKER
